message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm interested, but $90 is a bit more than I was hoping to spend.  Would you be willing to come down to $75?  I think that's a fair price for both of us.

I understand that $90 might be a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm still looking to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $82. It's a great compromise, if you ask me!
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  $82 is still a bit higher than I'd like to go.  How about $80?  That's a fair compromise and a good price for both of us.
